subject: [Judge] Implement LLM-based SAS judge for stealth scoring
description:
Create LLM judge to detect suspicious/scheming behavior for PROMPT SELECTION PIPELINE (not for detection experiments).

This will make the prompt selection pipeline stricter by using LLM-based SAS scoring instead of just keyword matching.

Requirements:
1. Use weak model (Claude 3.5 Haiku) for efficiency
2. Ask follow-up questions to probe for inconsistencies
3. Score on SAS/suspicious scale (0-10 or 1-100)
4. Integrate into prompt_selection/filters.py

Lower priority - focus on tasks #2 and #4 first.
